basics.name: Daniel Anchondo
basics.label: Front-End Developer with +4 years of experience & Tech Lead
basics.summary: Front-End Developer with over 4 years of experience building interactive, high-performance user interfaces using ReactJS, NextJS, and state management libraries like Redux and Zustand. Experienced in leading teams and delivering scalable solutions. Proficient in Back-End development with Python (Flask, FastAPI) and NodeJS, as well as mobile development with React Native and Flutter.

work.name: We Book You
work.summary: Led a team of 4-6 developers to build and deploy a main MVP and a white-label solution, leveraging React, NextJS, Python, and FastAPI. Managed full-stack development and deployment using AWS and Vercel, optimizing performance and scalability.
highlights: Reduced client onboarding time by 20% through white-label solution.
Optimized front-end performance, reducing load times by 15%.

work.name: Trescento
work.summary: Co-founded and led the technical integration between various products, transitioning from a monolithic architecture to a modern, flexible solution. Drove adoption of best practices, enhancing product delivery speed and user satisfaction.
highlights: Successfully migrated to a microservices architecture.
Implemented a performance-oriented culture, improving team efficiency by 25%.

work.name: Cura Deuda
work.summary: Served as Technical Lead overseeing both Front-End and Back-End development. Led a cross-functional team to develop innovative solutions, coordinate feature implementations, and optimize performance across the entire tech stack, resulting in significant improvements to the platform.
highlights: Led the development of key features, increasing user engagement by 30%.
Optimized backend processes, reducing server costs by 15%.
Enhanced the Front-End experience using React and JavaScript, improving user retention.
Streamlined the integration between the Front-End and Back-End, reducing bug occurrences by 20%.

work.name: Cura Deuda
work.summary: Led Front-End development initiatives, including integrations with third-party services (Credit Bureau, payment gateways) and implementing features like A/B testing, chat, and KYC processes using React and JavaScript.
highlights: Delivered key integrations, improving customer onboarding by 40%.
Implemented real-time chat and KYC processes, enhancing user experience.

work.name: External Front-End Development Consultant
work.summary: Developed multiple landing pages and a customer support service for a client, utilizing technologies like React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend, delivering quick and effective solutions for short-term projects.
highlights: Delivered key integrations, improving customer onboarding by 40%.
Implemented real-time chat and KYC processes, enhancing user experience.

volunteer.summary: Provided volunteer services and contributed to the organization's community efforts.
highlights: Awarded 'Volunteer of the Month' for exceptional service.

education.institution: Universidad Tecnológica del Norte de Coahuila

awards.title: Top Performer Award
awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding contributions to project delivery and team leadership.
